thread.title: K1 De Ultimate welcomes another grandchild
thread.title_full: K1 De Ultimate welcomes another grandchild

author: Nwafor Polycarp
title: K1 De Ultimate welcomes another grandchild
text:
Home » Entertainment » K1 De Ultimate welcomes another grandchild K1 De Ultimate welcomes another grandchild On 12:06 am In Entertainment by Nwafor Polycarp Comments 
King Wasiu Ayinde Marshall, aka K1 De Ultimate has reason to celebrate as he welcomes another grandchild. The Fuji legend took to social media to share the happy news, announcing that his daughter, Sekinat Olatanwa and her husband have welcomed a baby boy in Florida, USA. 
K1 wrote, “To the glory of God, newest addition to the family of Ojushagbola, as K1 De Ultimate’s daughter, Mrs Sekinat Olatanwa Ayoka & Fuad Adeyemo welcomed a new baby boy in Miami, Florida, USA”. K1 DE 
The singer who has a number of children can only expect so much more grandchildren. 
KWAM 1 recently received favour from the most revered king in the Yoruba kingdom, as the Ooni of Ife, Oba Adeyeye Enitan Ogunwusi showered prayers on his children at the coronation of the new Olubadan of Ibadan, Oba Saliu Akanmu Adetunji l held on Friday, March 4, 2016. Nwafor Polycarp
